attributes.action: Award The late Michael Todd, a Knighthood for his services to Policing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Micheal Todd was a Coppers Copper and a well respected and liked police officer. His tragic death should not detract from his contributon of nearly 30 years to policing in the UK. I urge the prime minister to award him a knighthood something I feel everyone feels he would have richly deserved.

rejection.details: Honours submissions should now be sent via www.honours.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
